name: An Interns Nightmare
description:
Lost through a subspace anomaly we find our intrepid crew stranded on an odd Island Planetoid. Can you discover the mystery of why?

Controls: WASD and spacebar. H For headlights. I think gamepad works? Multiplayer maybe. Escape pulls you to menu.

Deliver the Thwomps to their home, but watch out for the ping pong balls of doom!

Successfully deliver enough Thwomps , power up to full to continue through the cave.

Coding: KainEnable

Voicework (Captian): aria.hibiki

Voicework (Computer): tarnagona 

Music: Uppbeat https://uppbeat.io/t/ilya-kuznetsov/serenity
